item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Tuesday, February 4, 2025 at 11:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. WikiTok (720 points | 126 comments)

29. The Slotted Counter Pattern (2020) (32 points | 14 comments)
30. The APL Challenge (3 points | discuss)
